title: Gen AI
description:
**Description** 

  
 



 Job Summary:
 



 We are seeking a highly experienced and innovative Team Lead (Architect level) with deep expertise in Generative AI and Machine Learning,
 



 and strong working knowledge of DevOps and Infrastructure. In this leadership role, you will be responsible for architecting, developing,
 



 and scaling AI\\-driven solutions, while also guiding a team of ML engineers and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



  





 Lead the architecture, development, and deployment of Generative AI and ML solutions across the organization.
 



  





 Architect end\\-to\\-end AI solutions including data pipelines, model training, evaluation, deployment, and monitoring.
 



  





 Collaborate with product, engineering, and data teams to translate business needs into AI/ML solutions.
 



  





 Provide technical leadership, mentorship, and code reviews for ML engineers and developers.
 



  





 Integrate DevOps best practices for ML workflows (MLOps), including CI/CD for model deployment in Databricks.
 



  





 Oversee infrastructure decisions related to model training (cloud compute, GPUs, storage, etc.).
 



  





 Stay up\\-to\\-date with the latest in Gen AI (Langchain, Langraph) and drive innovation within the team.
 



  





 Ensure system scalability, reliability, and performance in production environments.
 



  





  





 Primary Skills:
 



  





 Strong hands\\-on experience in Generative AI, including large language models (LLMs), embeddings, and transformers.
 



  





 Strong expertise in Machine Learning, data science, and deep learning frameworks: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face, etc.
 



  





 Hands\\-on experience with Vector Databases: integration, similarity search, and semantic retrieval.
 



  





 Strong understanding of RAG architectures, embeddings generation, and prompt engineering.
 



  





 Experience deploying AI/ML models in production environments with scalability and performance in mind.
 



  





 Secondary Skills:
 



  





 Proficiency in DevOps and Infrastructure: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, logging.
 



  





 Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure), especially AI/ML services and compute infrastructure.
 



  





 Familiarity with infrastructure\\-as\\-code tools like Terraform, Ansible.
 



  





 Exposure to MLOps platforms (e.g., MLflow, SageMaker, Vertex AI, Kubeflow).
 



  





 Qualifications:
 



  





 Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, AI/ML, Data Science, or a related field.
 



  





 8\\+ years of industry experience in software or AI development.

title: Senior Engineer- AI & Threat Detection
description:
**Job Description**
 Calling all originals: At Levi Strauss \\& Co., you can be yourself — and be part of something bigger. We’re a company of people who like to forge our own path and leave the world better than we found it. Who believe that what makes us different makes us stronger. So add your voice. Make an impact. Find your fit — and your future.
   

  

**Summary Of The Role**
 The Threat Detection Engineer plays an integral role in the protection of the brand and works directly with the Director of Threat Engineering and the broader Global Information Security (GIS) team. This role focuses on both fraud detection and cloud security detection engineering. The priorities and directives are consistent with the vision of the CISO across Levi Strauss \\& Company globally.
   

  

 The Threat Detection Engineer will take a lead role in safeguarding LS\\&Co.’s information and technology assets, critical suppliers, and consumers against the evolving threat landscape, allowing LS\\&Co. to make threat informed cybersecurity decisions to strengthen LS\\&Co.’s cybersecurity posture. This individual will work to detect, monitor, and respond to security incidents in real\\-time.
   

  

 This position will support LS\\&Co’s Threat Detection Engineering environment and is responsible for collaborating with various groups including the Security Operation Center to consume, validate, and create detection content across the enterprise. This role is responsible for developing, testing, and refining detection capabilities to identify fraudulent activity and cloud\\-based threats across our environment with automation of process and playbooks.
   

  

 The ideal candidate has a strong software development background. This role will design, develop, and implement detection logic, automation, and tooling to identify and respond to security threats. This role will collaborate closely with security operations, incident response, and cyber threat intelligence teams to improve detection efficacy and reduce risk to the organization.
   

  

**About The Role**
* Design and develop scripts and small applications to detect and respond to cyber threats.
* Automate security processes and workflows using programming languages (e.g., Python, PowerShell, Bash).
* Build tools to collect and analyze threat intelligence data.
* Develop solutions to monitor and secure cloud environments (AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Investigate security incidents and create scripts to help with analysis and response.
* Document code, processes, and findings clearly.


**About You**
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in computer science, information systems, cyber security or a related field; or equivalent professional experience.
* CISSP or equivalent certifications and experience a plus.
* Experience in detection engineering, threat detection, or security operations a plus.
* Hands\\-on experience with SIEMs or data warehouses.
* Experience developing fraud detection logic, focusing on transactional fraud, behavioral analytics, and account abuse a plus.
* Expertise in cloud security monitoring for AWS, Azure, and/or GCP\\- must have
* Strong programming skills (Python, Bash, PowerShell, etc)\\- must have
* Understanding of query languages (KQL, SPL, SQL)\\- must have
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills with a security mindset\\- must have


**Benefits**
 We put a lot of thought into our programs to provide you with a benefits package that matters. Whether it is for medical care, taking time off, improving your health or planning for retirement, we've got you covered.
   

  

**Here's a Small Snapshot**
* Complimentary preventive health check\\-up for you \\& your spouse
* OPD coverage
* Best in class leave plan including paternity \\& family care leaves
* Counselling sessions to prioritizing mental well\\-being
* Exclusive discount vouchers on Levi’s products


*We are an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to empowering individuals from all walks of life to achieve their professional goals with us, regardless of race, religion, gender, gender identity, pregnancy, disability, sexual orientation, age, national origin, citizenship status, or genetic information. We actively seek and encourage applications from diverse candidates, including those with disabilities, and offer accommodations throughout the selection process upon request.
   

  

 To ensure that our products and culture continue to incorporate everyone's perspectives and experience, we never discriminate based on race, religion, national origin, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, or marital, veteran, or disability status.*
**LOCATION**
 Bengaluru, India
   

  

**FULL TIME/PART TIME**
 Full time
   

  

**Current LS\\&Co Employees, apply via your Workday account.**

title: Senior Software Engineer-Credit
description:
**Who are we?**
 FalconX is a pioneering team of operators, investors, and builders committed to revolutionizing institutional access to the crypto markets. Operating at the intersection of traditional finance and  cutting\\-edge technology, FalconX addresses the industry's foremost challenges: Navigating the digital asset market can be complex and fragmented, with limited products and services that support trading strategies, structures, and liquidity found in conventional financial markets. As a comprehensive solution for all digital asset strategies from start to scale, FalconX operates as the connective tissue empowering clients with seamless navigation through the ever\\- evolving cryptocurrency landscape.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop, maintain and enhance FalconX’s proprietary credit management systems, infrastructure, data, and processes
* Architect and build scalable, robust, performant credit solutions for institutional clients and internal teams.
* Work with cross\\-functional teams (product, platform, frontend, data) to build end\\-to\\-end solutions driving the credit business.
* Experience with building transactional, performant systems at large scale, and ability to diagnose and prevent these problems.
* Write well tested readable code that meets our internal standards for style, maintainability, and best practices.
* Work with junior team members to breakdown tasks, help in technical solutioning and unblock them when they are stuck.
* Advocate for improvements to product quality, security, and performance that have particular impact across your team.
* Help to define and improve our internal standards for style, maintainability, and best practices for a high\\-scale web environment. Maintain and advocate for these standards through code review.


**Job Requirements**
* At Least 5 years of experience working in software development with minimum 2 years of working experience in Python or any other object oriented programming language.
* Domain knowledge in institutional financial services, lending and borrowing products.
* Familiarity with modern web technologies like AWS cloud, MySQL database, Redis caching, messaging tools like Kafka/SQS, Kubernetes etc and good understanding of trade\\-offs with one technology vs another.
* Have a good understanding of object oriented design patterns to make sure the codebase is maintainable and extensible.
* Have a good understanding of operating systems concepts like multi\\-threading, multi\\-processing
* Comfort working in a highly agile, intensively iterative software development process.
* Demonstrated capacity to clearly and concisely communicate about complex technical, architectural, and/or organizational problems and propose thorough iterative solutions
* Demonstrated ability to onboard and integrate with an organization long\\-term.


**Notice at Collection and Privacy Policy**
 Applicants located in California and/or applying to a role based in California, please refer to our Notice at Collection and Privacy Policy here.
   

  

**Inclusivity Statement**
 FalconX is committed to building a diverse, inclusive, equitable, and safe workspace for all people. Our roles are intended for people from all walks of life. We encourage all those interested in applying to our organization to submit an application regardless if you are missing some of the listed background requirements, skills, or experiences!
   

  

 As part of our commitment to inclusivity, FalconX would like to acknowledge that the EEOC survey has limited potential responses that you can select. For legal reasons, FalconX must use this language to align with federal requirements, however, we want to ensure that you are able to provide a response to our own voluntary survey questions about your identity that best aligns with your most true self.
   

  

*FalconX is an equal opportunity employer and will not discriminate against an applicant or employee based on race, color, religion, national origin, ancestry, ethnicity, sex (including gender, pregnancy, sexual orientation, and gender identity), age, physical or mental disability, veteran or military status, genetic information, citizenship, or any other legally\\-recognized protected basis under federal, state, or local law.*
*Applicants with disabilities may be entitled to reasonable accommodation under the Americans with Disabilities Act and other applicable state or local laws. A reasonable accommodation is a change in the way things are normally done which will ensure an equal employment opportunity without imposing undue hardship on FalconX. Please inform FalconX’s People team at recruiting@falconx.io, if you need assistance with participating in the application process.*

title: Data Engineer
description:
**About the Company** 




  





 ZAGENO offers the largest life sciences lab supply marketplace. Our one\\-stop shop helps scientists, lab managers, and procurement leaders compare products, source alternatives, track deliveries, and communicate order statuses in real time, accelerating innovation by saving valuable time. Leveraging advanced AI, ZAGENO enhances supply chain resilience and makes the customer experience superior, seamlessly integrating with existing systems to boost productivity and make online shopping for research materials convenient, efficient, and reliable. We are committed to innovation, excellence, and fostering a supportive, and dynamic work environment.
 



  





**About the Role** 




  





 ZAGENO is hiring a Data Engineer to establish data driven pipelines as well as seamless data platform setup. You would dedicate your time to improve the reliability, efficiency and performance of all data related operation environments across the ZAGENO platform and related systems in development, staging and production.
 



 Alongside establishing data driven pipelines to establish seamless Data Platform setup, Data Engineer would be dedicated full\\-time to improve the reliability, efficiency and performance of all data related operation environments across the ZAGENO platform and related systems in development, staging and production, fixing issues, responding to release efforts, and operational incidents.
 



 Key deliverables could include improved ZAGENO data pipeline availability, reduced data latency (all types) across environments. Increased utilization of ZAGENO infrastructure to minimize adding capacity as dataflows increase in volume and frequency as customers and catalog items are added.
 



  





**In this role, you will:** 




  




* Architect and develop data pipelines to optimize for performance, quality, and scalability
* Collaborate with data, engineering, and business teams to build tools and data marts that



 enable analytics
 


* Develop testing and monitoring to improve data observability and data quality
* Partner with data science to build and deploy predictive models
* Support code versioning, and code deployments for Data Pipelines



  





**About you :** 



* 3\\-5 years of experience as a data engineer
* Strong experience with DATALAKE, DATA WAREHOUSE and DELTA TABLES
* Strong SQL skills are required (we currently use Big Query, Databricks)
* Strong experience with Spark and big data tech
* Strong hand\\-on in Pyspark and SQL
* Experience orchestrating and scheduling data pipelines is required
* Expertise with cloud environments (AWS or GCP) is must
* Experience with cloud data warehouses and distributed query engines is a plus
* Proactive and keen attention to detail



  





**Our benefits** 



* Working for a mission\\-driven business with a meaningful challenge with a positive impact on the scientific community
* A clear growth perspective
* A learning and development budget to enable your ambitions to grow professionally in your field
* A professional and dynamic team with a global vision and mindset
* An exciting, international working environment \\- we have more than 40 nationalities!
* We’ve got your health benefits (medical, dental, and vision)
* Hybrid Work with 3 days work from office in our Bangalore office
* Staying healthy and fit is essential \\- we cover a part of your gym membership!
* Holidays and flexible PTO
* Paid family leave
* A budget to improve your home office environment

title: IoT Solutions Engineer (Training & Onboarding)
description:
**About Us:** 





 DATOMS is an IoT software platform that streamlines asset management and operations for equipment manufacturers, leasing and rental companies, and enterprises utilising machine learning, artificial intelligence, and the internet of things. Our scalable solution can be customized to meet the unique needs of each client and is trusted by top companies around the globe.
   






**Role Overview:** 





 We are looking for an
 
**IoT Solutions Engineer (Internal Training \\& Onboarding)** 

 who will be responsible for developing and delivering technical training programs for internal teams. The role focuses on
 
**enhancing the technical capabilities** 

 of engineers, customer success teams, and cross\\-functional departments by building a strong understanding of DATOMS products, IoT architecture, and implementation processes.
 




  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* **Develop Training Curriculum:** 

 Design, create, and maintain a comprehensive library of technical training materials, including presentations, hands\\-on labs, video tutorials, and technical documentation.
* **Deliver Engaging Training:** 

 Lead and conduct workshops, webinars, and in\\-person training sessions on the DATOMS platform, core IoT concepts (MQTT, Modbus), and best practices for implementation.
* **Build a Learning Lab:** 

 Create and manage a hands\\-on training environment with relevant hardware (microcontrollers, sensors, gateways) and cloud configurations to facilitate practical, real\\-world learning.
* **Become the Subject Matter Expert:** 

 Maintain an expert\\-level understanding of the DATOMS platform, from device firmware and communication protocols to our cloud architecture and data analytics features.
* **Bridge Engineering and Business:** 

 Collaborate closely with Product and Engineering teams to stay ahead of new features, translating complex technical updates into clear, concise, and accessible training content.
* **Measure \\& Improve:** 

 Develop assessments and feedback mechanisms to measure the effectiveness of training programs and continuously refine the content and delivery for maximum impact.
* **Act as a Technical Mentor:** 

 Serve as a key technical resource for our internal teams, helping them solve problems and confidently articulate the value and functionality of our platform.



  





**Required Skills \\& Qualifications:** 



* **Education:** 

 A Bachelor's degree (B.Tech/B.E.) in Electronics, Electrical, Computer Science, or a related engineering field.
* **Experience:** 

 3–5 years of proven, hands\\-on experience in IoT solution development or a similar technical role.
* **Passion for Teaching:** 

 A genuine enthusiasm for mentoring, explaining complex topics, and empowering others with knowledge.



  





**Core Technical Skills:** 



* **Firmware Development:** 

 Strong proficiency in C/C\\+\\+ and Python for embedded systems.
* **Embedded Systems:** 

 Deep understanding of 32\\-bit microcontrollers (e.g., ESP32, STM32\\), peripherals, and communication interfaces (UART, SPI, I2C).
* **IoT Protocols:** 

 In\\-depth, practical knowledge of application\\-layer protocols like MQTT and industrial protocols like Modbus. Solid grasp of the TCP/IP stack.
* **Cloud Platforms:** 

 Demonstrable experience with at least one major IoT cloud platform: AWS IoT (IoT Core, Greengrass) or Azure IoT (IoT Hub, IoT Edge).
* **OS \\& Tools:** 

 Comfortable in a Linux environment and proficient with version control (Git) and embedded debugging tools (GDB).
* **Exceptional Communication:** 

 Outstanding presentation, public speaking, and written communication skills are essential for this role.



  





**Why You'll Love Working at DATOMS** 




  




* **Impact:** 

 Empower our entire organization by elevating the technical knowledge and skills of your colleagues.
* **Growth:** 

 This role offers a unique path to deepen your own technical expertise while developing valuable teaching and leadership skills.
* **Culture:** 

 Join a collaborative, innovative, and supportive team that values creativity and knowledge sharing.
* **Benefits:** 

 We offer a competitive salary, comprehensive health benefits, and a flexible work environment.

title: Application Developer-Microsoft .NET Stack
description:
**Introduction**
 A career in IBM Consulting is rooted by long\\-term relationships and close collaboration with clients across the globe. You'll work with visionaries across multiple industries to improve the hybrid cloud and AI journey for the most innovative and valuable companies in the world. Your ability to accelerate impact and make meaningful change for your clients is enabled by our strategic partner ecosystem and our robust technology platforms across the IBM portfolio
   

  

**Your Role And Responsibilities**

* Your primary responsibilities include:
* Proficient Software Development with Microsoft Technologies: Demonstrate expertise in software development using Microsoft technologies, ensuring high\\-quality code and efficient application performance.
* Collaborative Problem\\-Solving and Stakeholder Engagement: Collaborate effectively with stakeholders to understand product requirements and challenges, proactively addressing issues through analytical problem\\-solving and strategic software solutions.
* Agile Learning and Technology Integration: Stay updated with the latest Microsoft technologies, eagerly embracing continuous learning and integrating newfound knowledge to enhance software development processes and product features

title: Lead II - Software Engineering - Java
description:
**Role Description**
 Role Proficiency:
   

  

 Act creatively to develop applications by selecting appropriate technical options optimizing application development maintenance and performance by employing design patterns and reusing proven solutions. Account for others' developmental activities; assisting Project Manager in day to day project execution.
   

  

**Outcomes**
* Interpret the application feature and component designs to develop the same in accordance with specifications.
* Code debug test document and communicate product component and feature development stages.
* Validate results with user representatives integrating and commissions the overall solution.

* Optimises efficiency cost and quality.
* Influence and improve customer satisfaction

* Adherence to engineering process and standards (coding standards)

* Number of defects in the code

 test cases and results

* Follow high level of business etiquette in emails and other business communication
* Drive conference calls with customers and answer customer questions
* Proactively ask for and offer help

* Build confidence with customers by meeting the deliverables timely with a quality product.
* Estimate time and effort of resources required for developing / debugging features / components

* Appropriate software programs / modules
+ Functional \\& technical designing
+ Programming languages – proficient in multiple skill clusters
+ DBMS
+ Operating Systems and software platforms
+ Software Development Life Cycle
+ Agile – Scrum or Kanban Methods
+ Integrated development environment (IDE)
+ Rapid application development (RAD)
+ Modelling technology and languages
+ Interface definition languages (IDL)
+ Broad knowledge of customer domain and deep knowledge of sub domain where problem is solved


**Additional Comments**

The ideal candidate will combine deep technical knowledge with leadership capabilities to guide development efforts, ensure code quality, and mentor junior developers. \\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_\\_ Key Responsibilities:

* Architect, design, and implement enterprise\\-grade microservices.

 Elgebra is an outsourcing partner that understands the need for flexibility and speed in today’s rapidly changing environment. Led by industry veterans with extensive leadership experience, Elgebra delivers best\\-in\\-class value without the excessive overhead costs of global leaders. The company is dedicated to constantly innovating to stay relevant to customer needs and excels in providing tailored solutions. Elgebra believes in collaboration, learning from both successes and mistakes, and continuously evolving to exceed customer expectations.

 This is a contract role for a Sr. Data Engineer with Python and SQL experience at Elgebra. The Sr. Data Engineer will work on developing and maintaining data infrastructure, modeling data, designing and implementing ETL processes, and optimizing data warehouses. The day\\-to\\-day tasks include data analytics, collaborating with cross\\-functional teams, and ensuring data quality and integrity. This is a hybrid role, meaning it is located in Bengaluru with some work\\-from\\-home flexibility.

* Strong Data Engineering and Data Modeling skills with 8\\+ years of exp.
* Experience with Extract Transform Load (ETL) processes

* Excellent problem\\-solving and analytical skills
* Ability to work independently and in a collaborative environment
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field

 Job Title: Salesforce Developer
   

  

 Hiring Location: Chennai and Trivandrum.

 As a Senior Salesforce Developer at UST, you will develop and maintain applications within ERP/CRM systems (primarily Salesforce), with minimal supervision. You'll collaborate with project teams to deliver high\\-quality solutions, mentor junior developers, and actively contribute to practice\\-wide initiatives.

 Develop applications/modules as per user stories and low\\-level designs.
   

  

 Debug, test (95%\\+ coverage), and document high\\-quality code.

 Perform impact analysis, effort estimation, and sprint planning.
   

  

 Mentor junior team members and assist with onboarding.
   

  

 Collaborate with stakeholders to understand requirements and suggest improvements.
   

  

 Contribute to internal knowledge\\-sharing initiatives, reusable components, and best practices.
   

  

 Support and improve deployment, sandbox refresh, and release management processes.
   

  

 Ensure adherence to Agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban) and project SLAs.
   

  

**Must\\-Have Skills**
 Salesforce Development: Apex, Lightning Web Components (LWC), Aura Components

 Integration Skills: Salesforce REST/SOAP APIs, External system integrations

**Good\\-to\\-Have Skills**

 Experience with sandbox management and refreshes

 Basic understanding of DevOps tools for Salesforce (CI/CD tools like Gearset, Copado, etc.)
   

  

 Experience in resolving production issues and incident management
   

  

 Participation in internal knowledge sharing or hackathons
   

  

**Experience Range**
 Total Experience: 4 to 8 years
   

  

 Relevant Salesforce Development Experience: Minimum 3\\+ years
   

  

**Performance Measures**
 High test coverage (\\>95%) and reduced defect leakage
   

  

 Completion of mandatory certifications (Salesforce Platform Developer I, II preferred)
   

  

 Timely and quality delivery of tasks/modules
   

  

 Contribution to internal learning, reusability assets, and client satisfaction

**Additional Information**

title: Software Development Specialist Advisor VMware-Cloud
description:
\\[Grade 11 Role]
   

  

 Job Title: Infrastructure Service Automation Engineer and
 **Infrastructure Architect** 
 – vRA, vRO, Scripting, Linux Administration and / or Windows Administration
   

  

 About the Role:
   

  

 We are seeking an experienced and dynamic individual to join our team as a Senior IT Infrastructure Services Automation Expert. In this role, you will be expected to engage with our customer and the Windows and Linux Administration teams to analyse, architect, design, and implement automated resolutions and/or automated execution of workflows/tasks that support the acceleration of transformation of the Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) engagement, using vRA and vRO tooling.
   

  

 Must Have Skills : This is a hands\\-on role. We are looking for skilled engineers with recent hands\\-on experience with the skills mentioned below.
   

  

 Primary Skills:
   

  

* Linux and or Windows – Hands on System Administrator experience– develop/build Virtual Machines and manage instances at scale
* VRA/VRO – Must be hands on developer and architect
* VMware suite – Must have good working knowledge of the Suite
* Scripting – Must have good experience of scripting (any/all): (1\\) JavaScript, (2\\) Perl, (3\\) Bash, (4\\) PowerShell scripting, (5\\) Python
* Cloud – Must have hands\\-on Cloud (AWS / Azure) Automation services like, AWS Systems Manager, IAM, Secret Manager, Lambda, Step\\- functions, AWS Cloud Formation Templates, Azure functions, Logic Apps, Patching solutions, ARM etc
* Config Management: ( Ansible / Chef ) Must have hands on creating playbooks and cookbooks, roles and recipes etc.


 Secondary Skills:
   

  

* Terraform/Jenkins/GIT etc.
* Rundeck / Ansible
* RESTful APIs/Micro Services
* ServiceNow APIs (ITSM)
* Site Reliability Engineering
* Infrastructure as Code principles
* Knowledge of Kubernetes / Docker Containers
* Knowledge of Monitoring tools – Nagios, SCCM


 Other inputs:
   

  

* Expert oral, written and presentation skills.
* Candidates with Computer Science Engineering degree are preferred
* Experience of working with OEMs and focused on Infrastructure Management


 We are not looking for:
   

  

* project managers,
* people who do not have more recent hands\\-on experience, or

 If you’re ready to take on an exciting leadership role and bring your expertise to a dynamic and growing organization, we want to hear from you!
   

  

 Apply now and be part of our success story!

title: Platform Engineer – Adobe Experience Cloud, PlatformX
description:
Do you want to be part of an inclusive team that works to develop innovative therapies for patients? Every day, we are driven to develop and deliver innovative and effective new medicines to patients and physicians. If you want to be part of this exciting work, you belong at Astellas!
   

  

 Astellas Pharma Inc. is a pharmaceutical company conducting business in more than 70 countries around the world. We are committed to turning innovative science into medical solutions that bring value and hope to patients and their families. Keeping our focus on addressing unmet medical needs and conducting our business with ethics and integrity enables us to improve the health of people throughout the world. For more information on Astellas, please visit our website at www.astellas.com .
   

  

 This position is based in Bengaluru and will require some on\\-site work.
   

  

**Purpose And Scope**
 As an Adobe Experience Cloud Platform Engineer in Adobe Platforms chapter, you will play a pivotal role in advancing our digital initiatives within our agile organization by designing and delivering innovative, enterprise\\-grade digital marketing solutions based on Adobe and other Digital Experience platforms. This role exists to identify and Orchestrate customer journey to personalize and deliver omnichannel experiences for HCPs, collaborating with cross\\-functional stakeholders both internal and external driving business value through technical expertise and stakeholder engagement aligned to enterprise capabilities. Our agile operating model—comprising Digital Capability for skill growth and Digital Execution for mission\\-aligned collaboration—uniquely positions you to balance cutting\\-edge digital marketing solution delivery with the development of specialized expertise.
   

  

 In this role, you will design, develop, deploy web solutions, customer journeys, derive insights from data, deliver Nex best experiences to HCPs to offer personalized Omnichannel experience using Adobe suite of Products and other digital experience platforms in the industry to elevate customer experience. You will work directly with stakeholders to translate requirements into scalable digital marketing solutions, multitask across projects and stay ahead of technological advancements, making this position critical for transformative digital impact for the enterprise.
   

  

 You will be at the forefront of implementing innovative solutions and will have the opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge technologies in your field.
   

  

**Essential Job Responsibilities**
* Develop and Lead digital marketing capabilities leveraging Adobe Experience cloud products
* Translate business needs into technical solutions /designs which includes enterprise\\-level architecture and implementing strategies.
* Experience in software design, development, and implementation using Digital experience platforms in an enterprise
* Act as the single point of contact to business, platform engineers to develop and deliver digital solutions
* Accountable for one or more platforms as the system owner to deliver and mature platform capabilities
* Collaborate with Business Analyst, Platform Engineers, Scrum lead, Value Team captain to execute implementations and provide technical guidance.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to deliver exceptional digital experiences, ensuring optimal performance, scalability, and usability.
* Performance Monitoring and Optimization: Regularly monitor performance of the digital solutions for optimal performance and effective delivery.
* Security \\& Compliance: Ensure solutions are secure and compliant with enterprise standards, including governance and necessary documentation.
* Data Reporting: Use data to derive meaningful insights to action and activate through right channels.
* Continuous Learning: Engage in continuous learning and professional development to stay abreast of the latest trends and technologies in a specific area of expertise.
* Innovation: Contribute innovative ideas and approaches to enhance project outcomes and digital capabilities.
* Reporting: Regularly report on system use to your Chapter Lead, VT captain, and team members.
* Problem\\-Solving: Employ analytical and problem\\-solving skills to overcome project challenges and deliver effective solutions.
* Quality Assurance: Ensure the highest quality and consistency in the work delivered.
* Advanced problem\\-solving capabilities to troubleshoot and resolve issues across Adobe and other platforms.
* Exceptional team skills, with the ability to work effectively with development teams, business users, vendors, and external agencies.
* Adaptable to evolving project scopes and technologies, with a commitment to continuous learning in Adobe domain.
* Ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices for security, scalability, and reliability.


**Qualifications Required**
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in relevant field, e.g., Computer Science, Engineering, Data Science, Business Administration.
* Overall 10\\+ Years of experience in Information Technology
* Strong knowledge and at least 6\\+years of hands on experience with one or more of the platforms– Adobe Experience Manager, Microsoft Dot.Net, Adobe Real Time CDP, Marketo, Adobe Analytics, Adobe Target, Customer Journey Analytics, Adobe Journey Optimizer and other Marketing related technology platforms such as Consent and Preference Management( CPM), Customer Identity and Access Management (CIAM),Next Best Actions, Decision Support Engine etc..
* Experience delivery External facing web sites
* Experience defining Customer Journeys and developing data flows to orchestrate customer journey
* In\\-depth knowledge and experience in development/ configuration/ business operations delivering solutions on one or more of the above Marketing technology products.
* Strong knowledge of Sales \\& Marketing technologies and operations
* Should also have hands on exposure to integration technologies that integrates to CRM, MDM, Datawarehouse and other third\\-party systems.
* Extensive knowledge working with creative agencies and collaborating with brand teams to deliver digital capabilities.
* Experience delivering omnichannel capabilities for HCPs, Patients and Payors required.
* Relevant experience in business analysis, technical analysis, or a related area, demonstrating a track record of bridging business needs with technical solutions.
* Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills to understand complex business issues and develop appropriate technical solutions.
* Technical Knowledge: Good understanding of information technology, software development life cycles, and architectural frameworks. Familiarity with programming languages, databases, and software development tools is beneficial.
* Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to convey technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders and vice versa.
* Collaboration: Ability to work effectively in a team environment, collaborating with diverse groups of stakeholders, including business users, Digital professionals, and management.
* Project Management: Good knowledge of Agile methodology, DevOps, CI/CD principles, and practices.
* Attention to Detail: Precision in documenting requirements, specifications, and project details to ensure clarity and alignment with objectives.
* Adaptability: Flexibility to adapt to changing requirements, technologies, and project priorities.
* Experience with Agile and DevOps methodologies, including Azure DevOps for CI/CD pipelines and version control in Adobe platform deployments.
* Adaptability: Flexibility to adapt to changing requirements, technologies, and project priorities.
* Preferred Qualifications:
* Technical certification in one or more of Adobe Experience Cloud products ois a plus
* Life Sciences / Pharma industry experience


**Astellas’ Global Capability Centres – Overview**
 Astellas’ Global Capability Centres (GCCs) are strategically located sites that give Astellas the ability to access talent across various functions in the value chain and to co\\-locate core capabilities that are currently dispersed. Our three GCCs are located in India, Poland and Mexico.
   

  

 The GCCs will enhance our operational efficiency, resilience and innovation potential, enabling a timely response to changing business demands.
   

  

 Our GCCs are an integral part of Astellas, guided by our shared values and behaviors, and are critical enablers of the company’s strategic priorities, sustainable growth, and commitment to turn innovative science into VALUE for patients.
   

  

 At Astellas we recognize the importance of work/life balance, and we are proud to offer a hybrid working solution allowing time to connect with colleagues at the office with the flexibility to also work from home. We believe this will optimize the most productive work environment for all employees to succeed and deliver. Hybrid work from certain locations may be permitted in accordance with Astellas’ Responsible Flexibility Guidelines.
   

  

 Category PlatformX
   

  

 Astellas is committed to equality of opportunity in all aspects of employment.
   

  

 EOE including Disability/Protected Veterans

title: Lead II - Software Engineering - ServiceNow UI Developer
description:
**Role Description**
**Job Title: ServiceNow Developer – UI Experience**
**Experience Range: 5 \\- 10 Years**
**Location:** 
 Hyderabad, Bangalore, Kochi, Trivandrum, Pune, Noida, Chennai
   

  

**Job Summary**
 We are looking for a
 **ServiceNow Developer – UI Experience** 
 who specializes in designing and developing
 **intuitive, responsive, and user\\-friendly interfaces** 
 within the ServiceNow platform. The ideal candidate should have expertise in
 **ServiceNow UI development, front\\-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AngularJS), and Service Portal customization** 
 to enhance user interaction and improve overall system usability.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
**UI/UX Development:**
* Develop customized and dynamic user interfaces on ServiceNow using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and ServiceNow UI tools.
* Build and maintain Service Portals, Catalog items, and custom UI components to enhance user experience.
* Ensure UI designs are responsive, accessible (WCAG\\-compliant), and performance\\-optimized.


**Service Portal \\& Catalog Development**
* Design and implement user\\-friendly Service Portals using ServiceNow’s AngularJS\\-based framework.
* Customize and optimize Service Catalog items and workflows for improved usability and efficiency.
* Develop widgets using ServiceNow’s Widget Editor and HTML/CSS to meet specific UI requirements.


**Scripting \\& Automation**
* Write and maintain efficient JavaScript code (Client Scripts, UI Policies, UI Actions, Business Rules) to improve UI functionality.
* Utilize ServiceNow’s Glide APIs for advanced UI customization and dynamic content rendering.
* Implement REST API integrations for real\\-time data updates within ServiceNow UI elements.


**Testing \\& Quality Assurance**
* Perform unit testing and support system integration testing for UI components.
* Debug and troubleshoot UI\\-related issues, ensuring smooth cross\\-browser and cross\\-device performance.
* Collaborate with QA teams to execute test cases related to UI/UX components and Service Portal functionality.


**Must\\-Have Skills**
**Technical Skills:**
**ServiceNow Platform Expertise**
* Strong knowledge of ServiceNow UI development, particularly Service Portal, Service Catalog, and Knowledge Base customization.
* Hands\\-on experience with ServiceNow Scripting APIs (Client Scripts, UI Policies, UI Actions).
* Proficiency in creating custom widgets using ServiceNow’s Widget Editor.
* Familiarity with GlideForm and GlideUser APIs for personalized user experiences.


**Front\\-End Development**
* Expertise in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and AngularJS for building modern UI interfaces.
* Strong understanding of UI/UX best practices, accessibility standards (WCAG), and responsive design.
* Experience with front\\-end frameworks like Bootstrap for improved UI consistency.


**Integration \\& Scripting**
* Experience with REST/SOAP API integrations to dynamically update UI elements with external system data.
* Understanding of JSON and XML for data exchange and dynamic content generation.
* Proficiency in JavaScript, AngularJS, and GlideScript for interactive UI component development.


**Good\\-to\\-Have Skills**
* Experience with automated testing tools (e.g., Selenium, ATF) for ServiceNow UI testing.
* Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies in a development environment.
* Prior experience working with ServiceNow Performance Analytics and Dashboards.


**ServiceNow Certifications**
* Mandatory:
+ ServiceNow Certified System Administrator (CSA)

* Preferred:
+ ServiceNow Certified Application Developer (CAD)
+ Certified Implementation Specialist – Service Portal
+ UI/UX\\-related certifications or courses


**Soft Skills**
* Strong analytical and problem\\-solving skills with attention to UI/UX detail.
* Excellent communication skills to collaborate with technical and non\\-technical teams.
* Ability to work independently and within a team to deliver projects on time.
* Adaptability to changing requirements and a passion for UI/UX trends and innovations.


**Preferred Experience**
* 3\\+ years of experience in ServiceNow development with a focus on UI/UX design and front\\-end development.
* Prior experience in Service Portal and Catalog customization within ServiceNow.
* Familiarity with Agile and Scrum methodologies in a development environment.


**Skills**
 servicenow UI,Html,Css,Javascript

title: Advanced Application Engineer
description:
**Project Role :** 
 Advanced Application Engineer
   

  

**Project Role Description :** 
 Develop innovative technology solutions for emerging industries and products. Interpret system requirements into design specifications.
   

  

**Must have skills :** 
 BlueYonder Production Planning
   

  

**Good to have skills :** 
 NA
   

  

**Minimum 7\\.5 Year(s) Of Experience Is Required**
**Educational Qualification :** 
 15 years full time education
   

  

 Summary: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Team Lead to spearhead the implementation of Blue Yonder Factory Planner for strategic manufacturing clients. The ideal candidate will bring deep functional expertise in factory planning and solid technical knowledge of Blue Yonder’s planning architecture, MOCA framework, and integration methodologies. You will lead end\\-to\\-end solution delivery, working closely with client stakeholders, business users, and technical teams to ensure successful deployments and business adoption. Roles \\& Responsibilities : \\- Lead Blue Yonder Factory Planner implementation projects including scoping, requirement gathering, solution design, configuration, testing, and deployment. \\- Collaborate with client’s business teams to understand production planning requirements, constraints, and process nuances. \\- Translate functional requirements into technical specifications and work with developers and integration teams to deliver complete solutions. \\- Configure Blue Yonder Factory Planner based on best practices to support factory sequencing, constraint\\-based planning, pegging, and order prioritization. \\- Drive MOCA/Java\\-based customization and scripting as needed for planning rules or integration logic. \\- Own and drive defect triage, root cause analysis, and SIT/UAT support during all testing phases. \\- Facilitate data mapping and migration from legacy systems; validate data accuracy and system readiness. \\- Mentor junior consultants and ensure quality delivery across all project phases. \\- Liaise with Blue Yonder CoE or product support teams for solution optimization or issue resolution. \\- Ensure alignment with overall transformation program timelines and deliverables. Professional \\& Technical Experience : \\- 7–10 years of overall experience, with at least 3–5 years in Blue Yonder Factory Planner implementation. \\- Deep functional knowledge in manufacturing planning, shop floor constraints, pegging strategies, and MPS/MRP processes. \\- Solid hands\\-on experience with MOCA commands, database structures, and integration with upstream (e.g., SAP, Oracle) and downstream systems. \\- Experience working in end\\-to\\-end Blue Yonder implementation projects – from design to go\\-live. \\- Strong SQL knowledge and ability to debug planning outputs and performance. \\- Familiarity with integration tools like Mulesoft, SAP PI/PO, or custom APIs is a plus. \\- Exposure to demand planning, supply planning, or control tower modules is advantageous. \\- Excellent communication, client\\-facing, and team management skills.

title: Functional Safety
description:
**Job Description**
 Works in the area of Software Engineering, which encompasses the development, maintenance and optimization of software solutions/applications.
   

  

* Applies scientific methods to analyse and solve software engineering problems.
* He/she is responsible for the development and application of software engineering practice and knowledge, in research, design, development and maintenance.
* His/her work requires the exercise of original thought and judgement and the ability to supervise the technical and administrative work of other software engineers.
* The software engineer builds skills and expertise of his/her software engineering discipline to reach standard software engineer skills expectations for the applicable role, as defined in Professional Communities.
* The software engineer collaborates and acts as team player with other software engineers and stakeholders.

title: Lead II - Data Engineering
description:
**Role Description**
**Role Proficiency:**
 This role requires proficiency in developing data pipelines including coding and testing for ingesting wrangling transforming and joining data from various sources. The ideal candidate should be adept in ETL tools like Informatica Glue Databricks and DataProc with strong coding skills in Python PySpark and SQL. This position demands independence and proficiency across various data domains. Expertise in data warehousing solutions such as Snowflake BigQuery Lakehouse and Delta Lake is essential including the ability to calculate processing costs and address performance issues. A solid understanding of DevOps and infrastructure needs is also required.
   

  

**Outcomes**
* Act creatively to develop pipelines/applications by selecting appropriate technical options optimizing application development maintenance and performance through design patterns and reusing proven solutions. Support the Project Manager in day\\-to\\-day project execution and account for the developmental activities of others.
* Interpret requirements create optimal architecture and design solutions in accordance with specifications.
* Document and communicate milestones/stages for end\\-to\\-end delivery.
* Code using best standards debug and test solutions to ensure best\\-in\\-class quality.
* Tune performance of code and align it with the appropriate infrastructure understanding cost implications of licenses and infrastructure.
* Create data schemas and models effectively.
* Develop and manage data storage solutions including relational databases NoSQL databases Delta Lakes and data lakes.
* Validate results with user representatives integrating the overall solution.
* Influence and enhance customer satisfaction and employee engagement within project teams.


**Measures Of Outcomes**
* TeamOne's Adherence to engineering processes and standards
* TeamOne's Adherence to schedule / timelines
* TeamOne's Adhere to SLAs where applicable
* TeamOne's \\# of defects post delivery
* TeamOne's \\# of non\\-compliance issues
* TeamOne's Reduction of reoccurrence of known defects
* TeamOne's Quickly turnaround production bugs
* Completion of applicable technical/domain certifications
* Completion of all mandatory training requirementst
* Efficiency improvements in data pipelines (e.g. reduced resource consumption faster run times).
* TeamOne's Average time to detect respond to and resolve pipeline failures or data issues.
* TeamOne's Number of data security incidents or compliance breaches.


**Code**
**Outputs Expected:**
* Develop data processing code with guidance ensuring performance and scalability requirements are met.
* Define coding standards templates and checklists.
* Review code for team and peers.


**Documentation**
* Create/review templates checklists guidelines and standards for design/process/development.
* Create/review deliverable documents including design documents architecture documents infra costing business requirements source\\-target mappings test cases and results.


**Configure**
* Define and govern the configuration management plan.
* Ensure compliance from the team.


**Test**
* Review/create unit test cases scenarios and execution.
* Review test plans and strategies created by the testing team.
* Provide clarifications to the testing team.


**Domain Relevance**
* Advise data engineers on the design and development of features and components leveraging a deeper understanding of business needs.
* Learn more about the customer domain and identify opportunities to add value.
* Complete relevant domain certifications.


**Manage Project**
* Support the Project Manager with project inputs.
* Provide inputs on project plans or sprints as needed.
* Manage the delivery of modules.


**Manage Defects**
* Perform defect root cause analysis (RCA) and mitigation.
* Identify defect trends and implement proactive measures to improve quality.


**Estimate**
* Create and provide input for effort and size estimation and plan resources for projects.


**Manage Knowledge**
* Consume and contribute to project\\-related documents SharePoint libraries and client universities.
* Review reusable documents created by the team.


**Release**
* Execute and monitor the release process.


**Design**
* Contribute to the creation of design (HLD LLD SAD)/architecture for applications business components and data models.


**Interface With Customer**
* Clarify requirements and provide guidance to the Development Team.
* Present design options to customers.
* Conduct product demos.
* Collaborate closely with customer architects to finalize designs.


**Manage Team**
* Set FAST goals and provide feedback.
* Understand team members' aspirations and provide guidance and opportunities.
* Ensure team members are upskilled.
* Engage the team in projects.
* Proactively identify attrition risks and collaborate with BSE on retention measures.


**Certifications**
* Obtain relevant domain and technology certifications.


**Skill Examples**
* Proficiency in SQL Python or other programming languages used for data manipulation.
* Experience with ETL tools such as Apache Airflow Talend Informatica AWS Glue Dataproc and Azure ADF.
* Hands\\-on experience with cloud platforms like AWS Azure or Google Cloud particularly with data\\-related services (e.g. AWS Glue BigQuery).
* Conduct tests on data pipelines and evaluate results against data quality and performance specifications.
* Experience in performance tuning.
* Experience in data warehouse design and cost improvements.
* Apply and optimize data models for efficient storage retrieval and processing of large datasets.
* Communicate and explain design/development aspects to customers.
